product_name: Moving Comfort Flex Hoodie Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Moving Comfort Flex hoodie shirt offers an extra touch of warmth concealed in a fun-loving hoodie. It's great for cool-weather jogs or workouts. Nylon, polyester and spandex fabric offers warm comfort before, during and after workouts; it wicks moisture and resists odors. Fitted hood with a high collar features an adjustable drawstring to help dial in the fit. Rib-knit cuffs feature thumbholes to help keep sleeves in place and warm your hands. 26.5 in. length. The fitted Moving Comfort flex hoodie has a a next-to-body fit. Closeout.
short_description: The Moving Comfort Flex hoodie shirt offers an extra touch of warmth concealed in a fun-loving hoodie. It's great for cool-weather jogs or workouts.
